sqlMap.insert: insert into gk_business_log(oid,USER_ID, co_code, org_code, posi_code, oper_time, remark, money, nd, bill_id,table_name,compo_id,func_id) values(#oid:VARCHAR#, #userId:VARCHAR#, #coCode:VARCHAR#, #orgCode:VARCHAR#, #posiCode:VARCHAR#, #operTime:TIMESTAMP#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #money:DECIMAL#, #nd:VARCHAR#, #billId:VARCHAR#, #tableName:VARCHAR#,#compoId:VARCHAR#,#funcId:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.select: select t.*, (select user_name from as_user au where t.user_id=au.user_id) user_name, (select co_name from as_company ac where t.co_code = ac.CO_CODE and t.nd = ac.ND) co_name, (select org_name from as_org ao where t.org_code = ao.org_code and t.nd = ao.nd and t.co_code = ao.co_code) org_name, (select ap.posi_name from as_position ap where t.posi_code = ap.posi_code) posi_name from gk_business_log t where t.bill_id=#billId:VARCHAR# and table_name=#tableName:VARCHAR# and t.nd=#nd:INTEGER# order by t.oper_time
